description: A React Native application implementing a Tic Tac Toe game, allowing player vs AI and player vs player modes.

methods.name: handleMove
methods.description: Handles the player's move, updates the game board, and checks for a winner or draw.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to the initial configuration.

methods.name: toggleGameMode
methods.description: Toggles between player vs AI and player vs player modes.
